experience.description:
Working at Linx Impulse on an Email Automation solution for e-commerce companies which also provides custom product recommendations to their customers.
Our current stack ranges from AngularJS and Node running on Heroku to Scala and Java using Spark running on AWS.

Working mostly on small projects (Rails 5 API / ReactJS / Angular) while under tutoring from experienced developers. Also got to work on a big project on a Rails & BackboneJS open source task manager which was used as the company's task manager. We've also start migrating the Backbone views to React components.

I've been able to explore and learn something about IoT, building projects using Arduino Lilypads and Raspberry Pi. I've built there my first API using Rails 5 and also got to exploring Node.js/Javascript frameworks and technologies like Node, Express, Hapi.js and Electron/NW.js to build small projects.
<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Junior_enterprise">Junior Enterprise<a> for Federal University of Rio Grande do Norte's Software Engineering course.
